attributes.action: Make the UK join join a free trade agreement with Canada, Australia, New Zealand
attributes.additional_details: I would like her majesty's government to make this happen because CANZUK would improve the UK and allow for UK, Canadian, Australia and for the Kiwis to come over without trouble to live over hear and for UK citizens to be able to live over there as well. This would create one large military that can with stand attacks from China and even Russia and it would improve the defences of NATO. Could you please have a look at joining it, I think it would benefit us all. Merci beaucoup.
attributes.background: I would like Boris Johnson to consider a free trade agreement called CANZUK, with Canada, Australia, New Zealand and he UK to make one large country with a big GDP and free trade and one big military budget.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554372
